definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: perhaps Aram. plaited or braided work (cf. then Aram. [[סְרָרָא]] lattice-work, net-work (= BH [[מִכְבָּר]]), textile stuff, curtain (= BH [[קְלָעִים]]), [[סַרְדוּתָא]] plaited or braided work; NH [[סָרָד]] plaiter, [[סָרִיד]], [[סָרוּד]] women-work; Hom:ZMG xliv (1890), 548 cp. Bad. šardu, skin);—alw. abs.: ´[[שׂ]]:([[הַ]])[[בִּגְדֵי ]] Ex 31:10, Ex 35:18, Ex 39:1, 39:49 (all P; all + [[הַקּׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[ב]]:, and last three + [[לְשָׁרֵת בַּקּׂדֶשׁ]]); LXX Ex 31:10 t. stola\v t. leitourgika/v (cf. Ex 39:1 [B v:Ex 39:13, LXXL v:Ex 39:11]).
